title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Development and Evaluation of Self-Directed Science Learning Modules for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational methodologies and understanding of science curriculum content
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can develop self-directed learning modules incorporating UDL (Universal Design for Learning) and TPACK (Technological Pedagogical Content Knowledge) technology integration models
Preservice teachers can continuously improve the effectiveness of developed modules using the PDSA (Plan-Do-Study-Act) model
Preservice teachers can analyze module-based learning activity outcomes and provide feedback using formative assessment tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
